unnormalised: Arre bhau, te mhantat 15/08-ak porthun paus poddtolo mhunn? Fattlea vorsa legit, Independence Day-chi parade pausant buddon geli! Kiteak na ammi fuddlea vorsa celebrations 14/08-ak fattim ghevun yetalim? Na zalear, mhoje utor aik, 17:00 horam meren, pakka vatten udok bhortolem ani chai-pakora vataavoronn zatolem! ğŸ˜œğŸŒ§ï¸
normalised: Arre bhai, te mhantat ponrasave augustak portun paus poddtolo mhunn? Fattlea vorxikui, Swatantratai Divsachi parade udkant buddli! Fudlea vorxa ammi chaudrave augustak utsav fattim gheunche? Na zalear, mhoje utor dhorun dhuya, satraxim voranim, pakka udkant buddlole rosto ani chai-pakora havaman astolem!
text: Arre bhai, te mhunntat 15/08-ak porthun paus poddtolo mhunn? Fattli pavtt tory Independence Day-chi parade buddon geli! Fuddlea vorsak ami 14/08-ak utsav mukhar ghevchem poddtol? Na tor, mhoje utor sambhall, 17:00 voram meren, pakka road-ancher udok bhortolem ani chai-pakora vataavoronn zatolem!
